basics.name: Ayobami Kolade Pase
basics.label: I'm an IT Systems Engineer focused on systems administration, enterprise IT infrastructure, endpoint management, and operational support.
basics.x_title: Hi There! Thank you for visiting my Page
basics.summary: I'm Ayobami Pase, I design, support, and maintain enterprise IT environments, covering systems administration, endpoint management, identity and access management, Microsoft Auto Pilot & Intune, Active Directory, Linux and Windows systems, Device Security, and day-to-day IT operations.

work.position: Systems Engineer / Technical Support Engineer – L3
summary: Provided advanced L3 support across enterprise systems, identity services, and endpoint platforms.
Designed and supported secure, scalable infrastructure solutions for internal and customer-facing projects.
Optimized database operations, reducing downtime and improving overall system performance.
Troubleshot critical user-reported issues and built root-cause diagnostics to accelerate resolution.
Developed scripts and automation tools to improve operational efficiency and system reliability.
Documented operational processes and delivered technical support to internal users and stakeholders.
Managed multiple queues of technical support cases, prioritizing issues based on severity and user impact.
Collaborated with Product Managers and QA teams to investigate internal tooling and platform issues.
Identified opportunities for workflow and functionality improvements across support tools and processes.
Drove impactful changes by working closely with internal support teams and external partners.
Owned cases through resolution or escalation, ensuring timely and accurate outcomes.
Investigated and triaged Facebook and Instagram product tooling issues, escalating complex cases to Tier 2 Technical Support Engineers.
Investigated and responded to urgent and sensitive inquiries in line with established guidelines and policies.
Led Master Control Room (MCR) operations and supervised live broadcast production teams.
Ensured production quality and system security by reviewing workflows and technical tools.
Provided hands-on technical support for broadcast systems including OBS, TriCaster, audio and video mixers, and Adobe Premiere.
Investigated urgent technical issues, dispatched field crews, and coordinated incident resolution.
Transformed operational metrics into insights that increased staff productivity by approximately 50%.
Identified domestic and global news trends to strengthen editorial planning and output.
Audited customer support tickets to ensure SLA compliance and documentation accuracy.
Delivered weekly quality assurance reports and provided coaching to support team members.
Led customer service improvement initiatives focused on service quality and consistency.
Provided hands-on IT support including PC upgrades, hardware troubleshooting, and system maintenance.
Handled password resets, user access issues, and hardware dispatching for end users.

skills.name: Linux Operating Systems
skills.x_description: Hands-on Linux administration, including user and permission management, service configuration, SSH access, and system maintenance.

skills.name: macOS Administration
skills.x_description: Enterprise macOS administration, covering device provisioning, user account management, security configuration, compliance controls, troubleshooting, and lifecycle management.

skills.name: Windows Systems Administration
skills.x_description: Administration of Windows Server and client systems, including user accounts, group policies, system updates, permissions, autopilot, intune and troubleshooting.

skills.name: Infrastructure Automation
skills.x_description: Used Terraform and Python to support infrastructure automation tasks, standardize system configurations, and assist with repeatable environment setup under defined architectures.

skills.name: SSH & Secure Access
skills.x_description: Experience using SSH for secure remote access, key-based authentication, and managing connections to servers.

skills.name: Endpoint Management
skills.x_description: Endpoint provisioning, configuration, patching, and compliance management across Windows and macOS devices using modern device management tools.

skills.name: IT Service Management (ITSM)
skills.x_description: Incident, service request, and problem management following ITIL-aligned workflows, including SLA tracking and end-user support processes.

skills.name: Monitoring & Observability
skills.x_description: Implemented dashboards, metrics, and alerts using Datadog and Azure Monitor, with basic system and service monitoring on Unix-like servers via Webmin.

skills.name: Automation & Scripting
skills.x_description: Built command-line tools and infrastructure scripts using Bash and Python to automate repetitive ops workflows.

skills.name: Ansible
skills.x_description: Built and managed Ansible automation for multi-node environments, using playbooks to automate system updates and deploy common services.

skills.name: Networking
skills.x_description: Hands on networking fundamentals including IP addressing, routing, switching, and network simulation using GNS3.

skills.name: Virtualisation
skills.x_description: Hands-on virtualisation using VMware and VirtualBox to run virtual machines for labs, testing, and infrastructure simulations.

skills.name: Data Centre Operations
skills.x_description: Data centre operations experience covering system availability, monitoring, and incident response.

skills.name: Hardware & Peripheral Support
skills.x_description: Installation, configuration, and troubleshooting of desktops, laptops, printers, peripherals, and enterprise user hardware.

certificates.name: Preparing for Your Associate Cloud Engineering
